steps: Clone your fork using git clone
Create a new branch for your feature or fix
Push the branch to your GitHub remote
Open a Pull Request (PR) and add a clear title and description
Request a code review from a teammate
Resolve review comments and push fixes
Rebase or merge main before final approval
Merge into main and delete old branches
mistakes: Not syncing your fork before branching
Pushing directly to the main branch
Not linking the PR to an issue
